attributes.additional_details: TO GET RID OF A UNJUST TAX,WE ARE IN THE STAGE OF A DIGITAL CHANGEOVER AND PEOPLE OF THIS COUNTRY SHOULD HAVE THE RIGHT TO WATCH WHATEVER CHANNELS THAT ARE PROVIDED BY THERE DIGITAL SUPPLIERS THE BBC HAS WASTED OUR MONEY ON HIGH EARNING PRESENTERS AND RUBBISH SPORT THEY HAVE NOW MOVED TO SALFORD TO CUT COSTS,BUT THEY HAVE NOT MOVED TO CUT OUR COST AND LOWER THE UNJUST TV LICENCE IN THIS HARD FINANCIAL PERIOD
